sentences.sContent: I think there are many endangered animals in the world, such as tigers and pandas.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think there are many endangered animals in the world, such as tigers and pandas.
sentences.sCn: 我认为有许多濒临灭绝的动物，如老虎和大熊猫，在世界。

sentences.sContent: I think our government should punish those people severely who kill the rare animals. It is our duty to protect the endangered animals.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think our government should punish those people severely who kill the rare animals. It is our duty to protect the endangered animals.
sentences.sCn: 我认为政府应该严厉惩罚那些捕杀稀有动物的人。保护濒临灭绝的动物是我们的责任。

sentences.sContent: However, it holds six language families, two of which have only one remaining language, and almost all of the languages here are endangered.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, it holds six language families, two of which have only one remaining language, and almost all of the languages here are endangered.
sentences.sCn: 然而，它拥有六个语族，其中两个语族仅剩下一种语言，而且这儿几乎所有的语言都濒临灭绝。

trans.tranCn: 濒危的， 将要灭绝的
